trans-unit.source: Specifies how the interior of a closed path is filled.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何填充封闭路径的内部。

trans-unit.source: An application fills the interior of a path using one of two fill modes: alternate or winding.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序填充使用两种填充模式之一的路径的内部︰ 备用或绕。

trans-unit.source: The mode determines how to fill and clip the interior of a closed figure.
trans-unit.target: 模式将确定如何填充和剪辑闭合图形的内部。

trans-unit.source: To determine the interiors of closed figures in the alternate mode, draw a line from any arbitrary start point in the path to some point obviously outside the path.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定的在备用模式下的闭合图形的内部，请从路径中的任意起始点到某一时刻显然位于路径外绘制线条。

trans-unit.source: If the line crosses an odd number of path segments, the starting point is inside the closed region and is therefore part of the fill or clipping area.
trans-unit.target: 如果该直线跨过奇数数目的路径段，起始点在已关闭的区域内，因此填充或剪辑区域的一部分。

trans-unit.source: An even number of crossings means that the point is not in an area to be filled or clipped.
trans-unit.target: 为偶数的交叉点进行表示点不在一个区域来填充或剪切。

trans-unit.source: An open figure is filled or clipped by using a line to connect the last point to the first point of the figure.
trans-unit.target: 打开图是填充还是使用行连接到图的第一个点的最后一个点剪切。

trans-unit.source: The Winding mode considers the direction of the path segments at each intersection.
trans-unit.target: 绕组模式会将每个交点处的路径段的方向。

trans-unit.source: It adds one for every clockwise intersection, and subtracts one for every counterclockwise intersection.
trans-unit.target: 它将添加一个用于每个顺时针旋转的交集，和减去一个用于每一逆时针交叉。

trans-unit.source: If the result is nonzero, the point is considered inside the fill or clip area.
trans-unit.target: 如果结果不为零，点被认为在填充或剪辑区域内。

trans-unit.source: A zero count means that the point lies outside the fill or clip area.
trans-unit.target: 计数为零意味着点超出填充或剪辑区域。

trans-unit.source: A figure is considered clockwise or counterclockwise based on the order in which the segments of the figure are drawn.
trans-unit.target: 图是沿顺时针方向视为或逆时针旋转基于在其中绘制图的段的顺序。
